name: UpliftEfficiency
0:
”Alexa, open Uplift Efficiency”
”Alexa, ask Uplift Efficiency to open the day planner”
”Alexa, ask Uplift Efficiency to begin a work session”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: uplift efficiency
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Uplift Efficiency, the productivity skill that will boost your efficiency and keep you organized.

Day Planner
Organize a typical day by adding tasks like sleep, work, sports, leisure and more. Then ask us to remind you every time you begin or end a specific time.
Keeping your day organized and being reminded when to begin and end tasks you can work freely without stressing on what to do next. Also, by adding leisure times you can increase your efficiency within the day's work.

Productivity Timer
Working for hours at a stretch fells boring and reduces your efficiency. But by taking break every then and there you can raise your efficiency and you can reduce your stress too. The Productivity timer allows you to work according to one of the 3 clocks: Pomodoro timer, 52/17 clock, Ultradian Rhythm and be reminded at every time that you've got switch from work to break or break to work.

Screen Timer
The perfect feature for techies and developers to keep their eyes healthy and uplift efficiency too. Take a 20 second break every 20 minutes to look at a 20 feet distance and bring your eyes to rest. Just say for how long you will be working and Uplift Efficiency does the rest.

Use all these features and boost your efficiency....


Please Note: The health related information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
